name: Heart's Harvest
description:
Submission for 2023 Ludum Dare game jam! Grow crops, cook meals, and learn the stories of the residents at the facility in this simple, bittersweet game.

Controls: WASD to walk, left and right click to interact, E or tab to open inventory, and R to restart (in case you get stuck, but this will reset your progress)

Click or use F, G, and C to use the cooking equipment.
